join: assignee left outer join patent_assignee on assignee.assignee_id=patent_assignee.assignee_id
left outer JOIN location_assignee on assignee.assignee_id=location_assignee.assignee_id left outer join location as locationA on location_assignee.location_id=locationA.location_id

left outer join patent_inventor on patent_assignee.patent_id=patent_inventor.patent_id left outer join inventor ON patent_inventor.inventor_id=inventor.inventor_id left outer join location as locationI on patent_inventor.location_id=locationI.location_id left outer join assignee_inventor on assignee.assignee_id=assignee_inventor.assignee_id and inventor.inventor_id=assignee_inventor.inventor_id
left outer join inventor_rawinventor on inventor_rawinventor.patent_id = patent_assignee.patent_id
left outer join ipcr on patent_assignee.patent_id=ipcr.patent_id

left outer join uspc_current_mainclass_copy on patent_assignee.patent_id=uspc_current_mainclass_copy.patent_id left outer join uspc_current_copy on uspc_current_mainclass_copy.patent_id=uspc_current_copy.patent_id and uspc_current_mainclass_copy.mainclass_id=uspc_current_copy.mainclass_id left outer join uspc_mainclass on uspc_current_mainclass_copy.mainclass_id=uspc_mainclass.id left outer join uspc_subclass on uspc_current_copy.subclass_id=uspc_subclass.id left outer join assignee_uspc_mainclass on assignee.assignee_id=assignee_uspc_mainclass.assignee_id and uspc_current_mainclass_copy.mainclass_id=assignee_uspc_mainclass.mainclass_id

left outer join cpc_current_group_copy on patent_assignee.patent_id=cpc_current_group_copy.patent_id left outer join cpc_group on cpc_current_group_copy.group_id=cpc_group.id left outer join cpc_current_copy on cpc_current_group_copy.patent_id=cpc_current_copy.patent_id and cpc_group.id=cpc_current_copy.group_id  left outer join cpc_subsection on cpc_current_copy.subsection_id=cpc_subsection.id left outer join cpc_subgroup on cpc_current_copy.subgroup_id=cpc_subgroup.id left outer join assignee_cpc_group on assignee.assignee_id=assignee_cpc_group.assignee_id and cpc_current_group_copy.group_id=assignee_cpc_group.group_id

left outer join nber_copy on patent_assignee.patent_id=nber_copy.patent_id left outer join nber_category on nber_copy.category_id=nber_category.id left outer join nber_subcategory on nber_copy.subcategory_id=nber_subcategory.id left outer join assignee_nber_subcategory on assignee.assignee_id=assignee_nber_subcategory.assignee_id and nber_copy.subcategory_id=assignee_nber_subcategory.subcategory_id

left outer JOIN patent as patent_year on patent_assignee.patent_id=patent_year.patent_id left outer join assignee_year on assignee.assignee_id=assignee_year.assignee_id and patent_year.year=assignee_year.patent_year
left outer join wipo on patent_assignee.patent_id=wipo.patent_id left outer join wipo_field on wipo.field_id=wipo_field.id

left outer join government_interest on patent_assignee.patent_id=government_interest.patent_id left outer join patent_govintorg on patent_assignee.patent_id=patent_govintorg.patent_id left outer join patent_contractawardnumber on patent_assignee.patent_id=patent_contractawardnumber.patent_id left outer join government_organization on patent_govintorg.organization_id=government_organization.organization_id
left outer join patent_lawyer ON patent_assignee.patent_id=patent_lawyer.patent_id left outer join lawyer on lawyer.lawyer_id=patent_lawyer.lawyer_id
left outer join patent_examiner on patent_examiner.patent_id=patent_assignee.patent_id left outer join examiner on examiner.examiner_id=patent_examiner.examiner_id
